title: Motion To Impeach South Korean President Who Imposed Martial Law Fails
content: An opposition-led motion to impeach South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol over his brief declaration of martial law failed Saturday as it did not meet the required quorum after his party boycotted the vote.
summary: An opposition-led motion to impeach South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol over his brief declaration of martial law failed Saturday as it did not meet the required quorum after his party boycotted the vote.

title: Bangladesh Visa Rules Eased For Pakistanis, Sparks Concerns For India
content: Zia's party has historically kept closer ties with Pakistan unlike Sheikh Hasina's Awami League, who had kept a more pro-India stance. There is growing uncertainty about Bangladesh's new diplomatic and political outlook as well.
summary: Zia's party has historically kept closer ties with Pakistan unlike Sheikh Hasina's Awami League, who had kept a more pro-India stance. There is growing uncertainty about Bangladesh's new diplomatic and political outlook as well.

title: "Car Drove Away At High Speed": Explosion Hits Block Of Flats At The Hague
content: A three-storey apartment block in The Hague partially collapsed Saturday after a fire and explosion, firefighters said, with first responders searching for people under the rubble.
summary: A three-storey apartment block in The Hague partially collapsed Saturday after a fire and explosion, firefighters said, with first responders searching for people under the rubble.

title: Australian Woman Who Lost $1 Million In Scam Recalls Meeting Criminal
content: A woman in Australia who lost over a million in an elaborate scam eerily came face to face with one of the criminals while she was vacationing in China with her husband.

title: TikTok's Future In The US: How Trump Could Impact It

title: "Unacceptable": US Congressman Calls On Bangladesh To End Anti-Hindu Violence

title: Cambridge Responds To Backlash Over Thesis Linking Body Odour To Racism

title: Rape, Assault Allegations: Norway's Royal Family Rocked By 'Biggest Scandal'
content: A string of rape and assault allegations against the son of Norway's future queen have plunged the royal family into its "biggest scandal" ever, wrapping up an "annus horribilis" for the monarchy.

title: Temples Set On Fire, Centre Burnt Down In Dhaka, Claims ISKCON
content: The International Society for Krishna Consciousness (ISKCON) on Saturday alleged that its centre in Dhaka district in neighbouring Bangladesh was burnt down earlier in the day.

title: Trump, Biden, Kamala Harris Raised Total Of $4.7 Billion Funds For US Polls

title: Storm Darragh Brings Life-Threatening Winds To UK, Red Warning Issued

title: "Damascus Awaits": Syrian Rebels Have Begun Encircling Capital, Says Report

title: Man, 100, Marries 102-Year-Old Woman, Become World's Oldest Married Couple

title: Comets Brought Water To Earth Billions Of Years Ago, New Study Claims

title: Indian Student Stabbed To Death In Canada, Housemate Arrested
content: A 22-year-old Indian student was fatally stabbed in Canada's Ontario by his housemate, who has been charged with second-degree murder by the Sarnia Police.
